content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with burner inserters
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing item movement

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles providing power distribution

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel
- Ensure all burner devices have adequate fuel supply before operation

### Extraction Errors
- Cannot extract from empty or non-existent containers
- Verify container exists and contains items before attempting extraction

### Space Management Issues
- Some chests are full, blocking inserter operations
- Monitor chest capacity and ensure proper item flow management

### Fluid System Issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections and fluid flow between boiler and steam engine
